title: New: L A D D E R S – LIGHTS WALKED OUT
content:
Another act with seemingly no information available about them at all, there’s not too much I can tell you about Austin’s L A D D E R S, other than that they have awesome artwork and their debut track LIGHTS WALKED OUT is a wonderfully unorthodox affair.

There’s hints of Animal Collective and TV on the Radio amongst the jumble of eccentric vocals and peculiar guitar lines, although it’s entirely unique in it’s own right. Here’s hoping they can follow up LIGHTS WALKED OUT with another joyous slice of psychedelic pop.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
